name: Jewel Legends - Tree of Life
description:
The Hods, magical beings and pure of heart, once lived in harmony with the holy Tree of Life. But the endless greed of a dark demon forced them into hiding. Now, new hope springs eternal.

Using building materials, jewels and other valuables, switch two adjacent tiles to make a row of three or more matching tiles! The valuables will help you to rebuild the world of the Hods and to restore the Tree of Life to its former strength!

Features

• Rebuild the world of the Hods in this Match 3 adventure
• Help the Tree of Life return to its former strength
• Build marvelous structures such as Bath House Blubberpot, the Mushroom Farm and the Fountain of Wonder
• 100 levels and 8 bonus tools, 3 game modes
